verses.verse: Alas, <S%H1945><s%> oh land <S%H776><s%> of whirring <S%H9486><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> Which <S%H834><s%> lies beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Cush, <S%H3568><s%>

Which sends <S%H7971><s%> envoys <S%H6735><s%> by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> Even in papyrus <S%H1573><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> on the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the waters. <S%H4325><s%> Go, <S%H1980><s%> swift <S%H7031><s%> messengers, <S%H4397><s%> to a nation <S%H1471><s%> tall <S%H4900><s%> and smooth, <S%H4803><s%> To a people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> far <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1931><s%> and wide, <S%H1973><s%> A powerful <S%H6978><s%> and oppressive <S%H4001><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> Whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> divide. <S%H958><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> you inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> and dwellers <S%H7931><s%> on earth, <S%H776><s%> As soon as a standard <S%H5251><s%> is raised <S%H5375><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> you will see <S%H7200><s%> [it,] And as soon as the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> is blown, <S%H8628><s%> you will hear <S%H8085><s%> [it.]

For thus <S%H3541><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has told <S%H559><s%> me, "I will look <S%H5027><s%> from My dwelling <S%H4349><s%> place <S%H4349><s%> quietly <S%H8252><s%> Like dazzling <S%H6703><s%> heat <S%H2527><s%> in the sunshine, <S%H216><s%> Like a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%> in the heat <S%H2527><s%> of harvest. <S%H7105><s%>"

For before <S%H6440><s%> the harvest, <S%H7105><s%> as soon as the bud <S%H6525><s%> blossoms <S%H8552><s%> And the flower <S%H5328><s%> becomes <S%H1961><s%> a ripening <S%H1580><s%> grape, <S%H1155><s%> Then He will cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the sprigs <S%H2150><s%> with pruning <S%H4211><s%> knives <S%H4211><s%> And remove <S%H5493><s%> [and] cut <S%H8456><s%> away <S%H8456><s%> the spreading <S%H5189><s%> branches. <S%H5189><s%>

They will be left <S%H5800><s%> together <S%H9191><s%> for mountain <S%H2022><s%> birds <S%H5861><s%> of prey, <S%H5861><s%> And for the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> And the birds <S%H5861><s%> of prey <S%H5861><s%> will spend <S%H9517><s%> the summer <S%H9517><s%> [feeding] on them, And all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will spend <S%H9175><s%> harvest <S%H9175><s%> time <S%H9175><s%> on them.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> a gift <S%H7862><s%> of homage <S%H7862><s%> will be brought <S%H2986><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> From a people <S%H5971><s%> tall <S%H4900><s%> and smooth, <S%H4803><s%> Even from a people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> far <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1931><s%> and wide, <S%H1973><s%> A powerful <S%H6978><s%> and oppressive <S%H4001><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> Whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> divide <S%H958><s%> â€“ To the place <S%H4725><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> [even] Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
